Raw clinical note for records:
Patient: David R., 38M

Patient reports researching methods of suicide online, specifically looking at medication overdose quantities. He has been stockpiling his prescribed Ambien, hiding pills from his wife. Patient states he has identified a location—a remote cabin his family owns—and has been considering going there alone. He describes his ideation as "constant" and rates his intent to act as 7/10. He has written a note but has not yet shared it. Patient reports no protective factors he considers meaningful. Crisis intervention initiated.
